English: Can you send me an email?

Spanish: ¿Cuál es la fecha límite para este proyecto?
English: What is the deadline for this project?

Spanish: ¿Quién está a cargo de este proyecto?
English: Who is in charge of this project?
Can I take a day off?

English: What is your work phone number?

I need help with this file
